panel.label: Autoresponse
panel.name: Autoresponse
panel.text: Autoresponse makes the viewer respond to people who message you, with a custom message. The following wildcards are available to enhance your autoresponses: #n for user's legacy name, #d for their display name, #r for SLURL to your location, #i for your idle time in minutes.

check_box.name: AscentInstantMessageResponseRepeat
check_box.label: Autorespond every time you receive a message you've enabled autoresponse for

check_box.name: AutoresponseAnyone
check_box.label: Send basic autoresponse
check_box.tool_tip: Send the message in the box below to people you haven't muted.

check_box.name: AutoresponseAnyoneFriendsOnly
check_box.label: to friends only
check_box.tool_tip: Avoids sending this response to those you don't know

drop_target.name: AutoresponseAnyoneItemID
drop_target.tool_tip: Drop an item here to have it sent with the above response.

drop_target.name: AutoresponseNonFriendsItemID

check_box.name: AutoresponseMuted

drop_target.name: AutoresponseMutedItemID
